messages.title: Jane Thomas: Putting our community first
messages.content: This election will be a straight fight between Labour and the Tories

keyPolicies.policyDescription: With good local schools and a modern health service

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Dignity and independence in old age
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Providing a safe environment with good facilities and care
To connect our communities, tackle congestion and help the environment

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Serving Keighley and Ilkley, not just serving
keyPolicies.policyDescription: To build trust by being open, honest and transparent
This year alone there will be new buildings for Greenhead School, plus a new special school. Keighley College will buy Spring Gardens site, committed to see education improvements.
Labour's Personal Care at Home Bill is vital.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Putting the Needs of Young People First
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Over 1,700 people have benefited from the New Deal for Young People in this constituency.
There are now new neighbourhood police teams in every part of the constituency. Measures to tackle anti-social behaviour and new measures to cut police red tape are making a difference.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election will be a straight fight between Labour and the Tories.

issues.economy: Labour has transformed further education with the new Keighley College and provided Sure Start Centres in Braithwaite, Highfield and Silsden to provide childcare, early education and family support - all threatened by Tory cuts.
issues.education: Labour has transformed further education with the new Keighley College and provided Sure Start Centres in Braithwaite, Highfield and Silsden to provide childcare, early education and family support - all threatened by Tory cuts.
issues.socialWelfare: The winter fuel payment has made a real difference. I know now that with Labour, I can look forward to dignity and security throughout my retirement. - Local Resident

housing.content: This year alone there will be new buildings for Greenhead School, plus a new special school. Keighley College will buy Spring Gardens site, determined to see education improvements.

endorsements.endorsement: The winter fuel payment has made a real difference. I know now that with Labour, I can look forward to dignity and security throughout my retirement.

quotes.text: This election will be a straight fight between Labour and the Tories.
